title: Bhaje Vaayu Vegam
short_cast: Kartikeya Gummakonda, Rahul, Iswarya Menon, Tanikella Bharani, P. Ravi Shankar, Sharath Lohitashwa, Prithviraj

desc: To pay for surgery for his father, an aspiring cricketer makes a big bet. When the bookie cheats him, he retaliates — and gets caught in a crime web.
